title: The most frequent daily users of social media
summary: This statistic displays the most frequent Minutes in The from to , media Age Group .
In the four year period of investigation 35-44 aged between 11 and 18 15-24 old had the highest most frequent Minutes of with 150 Minutes of frequent Minutes in their diet .
The dietary Minutes of for 15-24 in this Age bracket was 15.4 % of total energy Minutes .
gold: Users aged 45 - 54 are the most frequrnt daily users of social media at 150 minutes , followed by 15 - 24 year olds at 124 minutes . 55 - 64 year olds come next with 110 minutes , while 25 - 34 year olds and 35 - 44 year olds the lowest users at 75 - 80 minutes each .
